ThumbnailJScrollPane - class jpo.ThumbnailJScrollPane.
The ThumbnailJScrollPane manages a JPanel in a JScrollPane that displays a group of pictures in a grid of thumbnails or ad hoc search results..
ThumbnailJScrollPane(SortableDefaultMutableTreeNode) - Constructor for class jpo.ThumbnailJScrollPane
creates a new JScrollPane with an embedded JPanel and provides a set of methods that allow thumbnails to be displayed.
